syllabus_info.title: Cambridge International AS & A Level Business

learning_objectives.description: Approaches to human resource management (HRM): the difference between 'hard' and 'soft' HRM; flexible working contracts: advantages and disadvantages of temporary contracts or flexible contracts including zero hours contracts, part-time, full-time, annualised hours, flexi-time, home working, shift working, job sharing, compressed working hours, the gig economy; the measurement, causes and consequences of poor employee performance; strategies for improving employee performance; Management by Objectives (MBO) â€“ implementation and usefulness; the changing role of Information Technology (IT) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) in HRM.
